name: distributed-banking-system
description: A distributed banking database system with microservices architecture using Node.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL

scripts.install:services: cd services/accounts-service && npm install && cd ../transactions-service && npm install && cd ../customer-service && npm install && cd ../../client && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:accounts" "npm run dev:transactions" "npm run dev:customer"
scripts.build: npm run build:accounts && npm run build:transactions && npm run build:customer
scripts.db:migrate: npm run db:migrate:accounts && npm run db:migrate:transactions && npm run db:migrate:customer
